content.description: The following question is based on the excerpt below.
content.question: The motivic fragment in box B is derived from the motive in box A through the application of which of the following developmental techniques?

unit.text: 6: Harmony and Voice Leading III - Embellishments, Motives, and Melodic Devices

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Use symbols and terms to describe and apply procedures for melodic and rhythmic transformation in notated music.
